Treatment_Options.details: Have a friend/family member check your incision daily for signs of infection.
Take your pain medicine as prescribed. Exercise should be limited to walking; no lifting, straining, or excessive bending. You may wash your hair lightly.

Increase your intake of fluids and fiber, as narcotic pain medicine can cause constipation. We generally recommend taking an over the counter stool softener, such as Docusate (Colace) while taking narcotic pain medication.
